Interface FlowRepository

    public interface FlowRepository
extends BaseEdgeRepository<eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Flow>
    Repository for operations with Flow domain objects.

      • find

        eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Flow find(eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node startNode,
                                                           eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node endNode,
                                                           eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.enums.FlowType flowType)
        Finds flow between two nodes. Only last committed revision is searched.
        Parameters:
        startNode - start node
        endNode - end node
        flowType - flow type
        Returns:
        flow or null

      • find

        eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Flow find(eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node startNode,
                                                           eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node endNode,
                                                           eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.enums.FlowType flowType,
                                                           java.lang.Boolean includeUncommitted)
        Finds flow between two nodes. Searched revisions are:
        • the last committed one - always
        • the uncommitted one - if is true
        Parameters:
        startNode - start node
        endNode - end node
        flowType - flow type
        includeUncommitted - flag, whether to search in uncommitted revision, not null
        Returns:
        flow or null
        Throws:
        eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.exception.InconsistentDatabaseException - if more than one edge with given parameters is found. This should usually not happen, there is, however, a state of the repository, in which this situation is valid. This state is during the merge in situation, when the edge is split into two because of different value of user defined edge property in last committed and new revision. Consequently, it is not safe to use this method during merge from the point of edge parameters resolving!

      • find

        eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Flow find(eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node startNode,
                                                           eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node endNode,
                                                           eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.enums.FlowType flowType,
                                                           eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.dto.RevisionInterval revisionInterval)
        Finds flow between two nodes. Flow need to be valid on the whole to be returned.
        Parameters:
        startNode - start node, not null
        endNode - end node, not null
        revisionInterval - revision interval restriction, not null
        Returns:
        flow or null

        Queries all flow edges that meet given criteria.
        Parameters:
        node - start node, not null
        direction - flow edge direction, not null
        revisionInterval - revision intervla, nullable
        flowTypes - flow types, nullable
        Returns:
        flows meeting given criteria
